data.title: The Best Pan Pizza in Town
data.text: I have been eating at this restaurant since I was in grade school and the pizza just gets better and better.  The small pan pizza is the best pizza of choice.  I eat here at least once a week.

data.title: Pizza is worth the visit!
data.text:
This pizza place was recommended by a local yogurt place in New Rochelle. After reading some mixed reviews online,we decided to try it for ourselves and glad we did. It was super busy (a good sign) around 8 PM with people picking up pizzas. Freshly baked large pizza was hot and the crust was crisp. It was pepperoni so a bit greasy as you would expect. Yum! 
Dining area was dirty (floor), but there was constant flow of customers eating non stop. We will take it out next time we visit but will eat here again.

data.title: Go elsewhere
data.text: We came in for some New York style pizza...and this wasn't the place.  Mine was cold.  The rest was greasy.  Find a different place to go.

data.title: Great pizza!
data.text: Thursday night is pizza night at my house & Town Pizza is our go to place every week. I love the pizza & the personal service. Also really good wedges & salads. Can't beat it for pizza nite take out! Definitely would recommend!
